original_title: Temporal Properties of the World: Passage
overview: A short film that explores human experiences of time. A middle-aged woman slips through the present and the past as she searches to locate her memories, her experiences in the present, and her visions of herself in the future.
tagline: she searches to locate her memories, her experiences in the present, and her visions of herself in the future.
title: Temporal Properties of the World: Passage
